about_the_game:
In this demo of Broken Alliance you assume the role of Anaïs the Emissary, touring the four factions of the world of Eol: the nature-loving Paradise, the technological powerhouse of Forge, the traditionalist Anchorage, and the fanatical Phobos. On your journey you can find, talk to, and battle with a host of characters, each of them fully voice acted.

Broken Alliance is an indie turn-based adventure strategy game with strong RPG elements, inspired by old school classics such as Heroes of Might and Magic, Age of Wonders, Master of Magic and Disciples... with a fresh deckbuilding twist. We want to bring you a revival of the classics combined with our signature focus on storytelling and a deep, challenging tactical combat experience. This demo provides a short glimpse into the different factions you can play in the full game, and serves as a prologue and tutorial to get you started on your adventure.

Learn what leads to the world-shattering conflict in the world of Eol, and stay tuned for the Early Access release of Broken Alliance!
